ygData.msgSnippet: Foxfingers stopped in mid leap. This wasn t a cat he was looking at but a seemingly large and peturbed wolf. OKAY theres no need to be hasty, I m sorry about

Foxfingers stopped in mid leap. This wasn't a cat he was looking at 
but a seemingly large and peturbed wolf. "OKAY theres no need to be 
hasty, I'm sorry about that over reaction." he didn't know what else 
to do it was either beg for mercy or run like the devil himself was 
after him. Options were extremely limited right now, either run and 
risk the autoguns or try and talk his way out of trouble. He 
transformed back to bot and set his pistol down at his side. "Easy 
there, I'm sure we can come to some sort of arrangement."

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::KitKat::
> 
> She transgformed into wold mode and snarled at him. "DO not anger 
me. 
> I shall keep my word. Honor above all else it be guarded with 
care.  
> Without honor, there is nothing left. Now, stand down and let's 
talk. 
> I am bigger and stronger than you in this form. I do not wish to 
hurt 
> you."
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > Foxfingers froze in his tracks keeping one hand on his pistol. 
He'd 
> > heard her name mentioned briefly as he ran away. "Like I'm 
expected 
> > to trust a Pred.?" he frowned glancing the room for a quick way 
out 
> > if he needed it. " I know how you handle intruders, I've been 
there 
> > one to many times. I'm not in any slagging hurry to go back." He 
> > transformed to fox and leapt at KitKat. with a name that ended in 
> cat 
> > how tough can she be.
> >
